title: Undercover Mistress
description: For Kate Carson, body guard to the rich and famous, love is a four letter word, and no man will ever make her curse. That's why she refuses a job to go undercover as the mistress of a reclusive author—until she finds out the body she'll be guarding belongs to AngusMcLeod, the Scottish hunk whose poster has been fueling her sexual fantasies for two years. There's only one catch. Angus can't know why she's really there. Chin up and gun loaded, Kate gleefully makes the ultimate sacrifice…her body for the safety of her client…unaware that the fulfillment of her wildest desires will lead to the thing she fears most—love.Review quotes for Undercover Mistress by Amethyst AmesSexy, sassy, and titillating don't even begin to describe what's in store for the reader... With a style reminiscent of Linda Howard and Jayne Ann Krentz, Amethyst Ames is a name to watch for in the romance arena.~Amy Cunningham, Romance Reviews Today5 Stars!First time author Amethyst Ames keeps readers on the edge of excitement... Angus and Kate are well-developed, intriguing characters... This is definitely not a book to be missed.~Reva Moore, Just Erotic Romance Reviews5 Hearts!"Three words describe this book...hot, hotter and hottest!"~Angel Brewer, The Romance Studio
